| History                 = The Chernayan Army was taken over by general [[Armand Petrov (Earth-616)|Armand Petrov]] during his ploy to carry out a coup d'état. After [[President Zawadski (Earth-616)|President Zawadski]] was ousted,{{r|Punisher Vol 2 218}} and the situation stabilized,{{r|Secret Warriors Vol 2 9}} the military started claiming lands, farms, businesses and everything else, executing their owners if needed.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 219}} Several internment camps were also ran by the military.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 220}}

On his way to kill President Petrov, the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] confronted and slaughtered countless of soldiers loyal to their new leader.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 220}} During a military rally to celebrate the recognition of the new government by the international community, Petrov was confronted by the Punisher, who proceeded to kill dozens more of soldiers.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 222}} Following President Petrov's death, it was confirmed that much of the Chernayan Army had been killed during the Punisher's pursuit.{{r|Punisher Vol 2 223}}
